mapper.update:
update actions
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eventsource = #{eventsource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaltype = #{evaltype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

r_shortdata = #{rShortdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_longdata = #{rLongdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
formula = #{formula,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where actionid = #{actionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update actions set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventsource = #{eventsource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaltype = #{evaltype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, esc_period = #{escPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, def_shortdata = #{defShortdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, def_longdata = #{defLongdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, recovery_msg = #{recoveryMsg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r_shortdata = #{rShortdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_longdata = #{rLongdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, formula = #{formula,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where actionid = #{actionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
